abstract: Grooveshark, a streaming service that has had troubles with the music industry, prompting Apple and Google to reject its mobile app, has circumvented those barriers with an HTML5 app.
snippet: Grooveshark, a streaming service that has had troubles with the music industry, prompting Apple and Google to reject its mobile app, has circumvented those barriers with an HTML5 app.
lead_paragraph: Daily updates on the business of digital music:

headline.main: Digital Notes: Grooveshark Finds a Workaround
